backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profile storage with getters and a save method plus a public sitemap URL query.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing sitemap-generation requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: .ic-assets configuration specifying caching and MIME headers for deployed frontend assets.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive deployment checklist covering build validation, asset verification, redirects, and production preview checks.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining DNS records, Caffeine configuration, and canonical-domain redirects for sangharshclasses.in.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining global color tokens and dark mode variables with applied utility rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, canonical tags, structured data, favicons, and Vite script loader.
frontend/public/_headers: Static hosting headers mapping content types for sitemap, robots, favicons, and ZIP download.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rules ensuring static assets return 200 and routing all other paths to index.html.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects deep links to root while excluding static assets from redirect.
frontend/public/google53082ab74af04c28.h: Google Search Console domain verification file with required verification string.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt permitting full crawling and referencing the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing the homepage with weekly change frequency.
frontend/src/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the admin shell component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminAuthP: Empty placeholder for an admin authentication panel component.
Empty placeholder for an admin-access gate component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminToast: Empty placeholder for admin toast notifications.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Empty placeholder for a deletion confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/admin/components/ProfileSet: Empty placeholder for a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AboutEditorPage: Empty placeholder for an admin page to edit About content.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminHome.tsx: Empty placeholder for the admin home page.
Empty placeholder for an admin user management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactEditorPa: Empty placeholder for a contact information editor page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CoursesManagerP: Empty placeholder for a courses management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/FacultyManagerP: Empty placeholder for a faculty management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/LayoutSectionsP: Empty placeholder for managing layout sections in admin.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component initializing diagnostics and SEO guards, wrapping HomePage in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section using marketing content, including paragraphs and a feature card.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors and displays a fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying phone, email, location, and action buttons with marketing content.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Courses section showing course cards and an additional info banner from marketing content.
frontend/src/components/DomainSetupDialo: Empty placeholder for a domain setup dialog component.
frontend/src/components/DownloadWebsiteC: Button that downloads a static ZIP file containing the website code.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Faculty section rendering educator cards with photos, subjects, and experience details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying site info, links, contact details, and social icons using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, mobile menu, and a download button.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section with background image, headings, CTAs, and animated stats using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Displays an error fallback card with options to refresh the page or return home.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp button that opens a chat using the phone number from marketing content.
frontend/src/content/marketingSiteConten: Centralized JSON-like content for the marketing site, including hero, about, faculty, and course details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActorSafe.t: Creates a backend actor with safe optional admin-token initialization and improved error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color tokens, dark mode variables, base styles, animations, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point mounting the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes homepage layout with hero, about, faculty, courses, contact, footer, and a WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/static-export/renderStaticS: Generates a full static HTML page using marketing content and escapes HTML where needed.
frontend/src/static-export/staticExportA: Defines source and destination paths for images to include in static exports.
frontend/src/static-export/zipWriter.ts: Provides an in-memory ZIP writer placeholder that tracks files and returns an empty archive.
Empty file placeholder for future content serialization utilities.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Implements runtime logging and error diagnostics with enable/disable support.
frontend/src/utils/seoGuards.ts: Applies SEO guards to enforce canonical URLs and noindex rules based on domain.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, plugins, animations, and content paths.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config with a plugin that generates a static site export, copies assets, and zips the output.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including marketing site architecture, static export pipeline, and ICP backend features with role-based access and content-driven sections. Also lists existing frontend and backend features with IDs, descriptions, and version info.
